mapper.select: SELECT sd.id id, sd.venue_id venueId, sd.venue_day venueDay, sd.venue_day_limit venueDayLimit, sd.service_id serviceId, ifnull( ( SELECT count(1) FROM hm_erp_process_shoot_schedule WHERE venue_schedule_id = sd.id GROUP BY venue_schedule_id ), 0 ) count FROM hm_erp_venue_schedule sd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT company_id, venue_schedule_id FROM hm_erp_process_shoot_schedule WHERE venue_schedule_id IS NOT NULL ) ord ON sd.id = ord.venue_schedule_id AND sd.company_id = ord.company_id WHERE sd.venue_day BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} and sd.company_id =#{companyId} group by sd.id

SELECT service_venue.id, venue.base_id, base.base_name, service_venue.venue_id, venue.venue_name, service_venue.service_id, service.service_name FROM hm_erp_service_venue service_venue LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue venue ON venue.id = service_venue.venue_id AND venue.company_id = service_venue.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_base base ON base.id = venue.base_id AND base.company_id = venue.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service service ON service.id = service_venue.service_id AND service.company_id = service_venue.company_id where service_venue.company_id=#{companyId} and venue.venue_status=1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO hm_erp_venue_schedule ( id, venue_id, service_id, company_id, venue_day, venue_day_limit ) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.venueId}, #{item.serviceId}, #{item.companyId}, #{item.venueDay}, #{item.venueDayLimit})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE venue_day_limit = VALUES (venue_day_limit)
mapper.select: SELECT venue_sch.id, venue_sch.venue_id, venue.venue_name, venue_sch.service_id, service.service_name, venue_sch.venue_day_limit, ifnull( ( SELECT count(1) FROM hm_erp_process_shoot_schedule WHERE venue_schedule_id = venue_sch.id GROUP BY venue_schedule_id ), 0 ) count FROM hm_erp_venue_schedule venue_sch LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue venue ON venue.id = venue_sch.venue_id AND venue.company_id = venue_sch.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service service ON service.id = venue_sch.service_id AND service.company_id = venue_sch.company_id WHERE venue_sch.venue_day = #{venueTime} AND venue_sch.company_id =#{companyId}
mapper.update: update hm_erp_venue_schedule set venue_day_limit=#{target} where id=#{schId}
